text: The Alfredo di Stéfano Stadium is the stadium of Real Madrid Castilla. They are the reserve team of Real Madrid. It was built in 2006. It has a capacity of 9,000. Future expansions are planning it to be able to seat 24,000. The stadium is named after club legend Alfredo di Stéfano. There is a statue of him at the entrance, created by Pedro Montes. ==Related pages== * Real Madrid * Real Madrid Castilla * Santiago Bernabéu Stadium * Alfredo Di Stéfano == References == Category:Stadiums in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Spain Category:2006 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Spain
title: Alfredo di Stéfano Stadium
